scripts.release:patch: pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm build && pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm build && pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' publish --access public
scripts.release:major: pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm build && pnpm -r --filter './packages/**' publish --access public
